title: Bug 24411[Welcome] Mouse click on link should select link
description: Bug 24411[Welcome] Mouse click on link should select link
SR:
build 20021001
1. Ensure that a welcome page is displayed when restarting the application.
2. Edit prefstore.ini in the workbench metadata to remove the welcome line.
3. Click on any link on the welcome page.
4. Observe that the appropriate action is executed, but the clicked link is not visually selected.
5. Return to the welcome page.
6. Expectation: The clicked link should be visually selected to provide more context to the user.
